Class MenuListener

java.lang.Object
  gui.MenuListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class MenuListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

This is the ActionListener used for various interactions with the surface MenuUI

Author:
Daniel Gotzens

start

public void start()
Starts up the Applewar-simulation. After checking through preferences, the UI will either show a PitchUI or a ProgressUI.

fileBrowse

public void fileBrowse(int id)
For the option of a text-file output, this method opens up a JFileChooser dialog.

Parameters:
id - Because there is a button to choose an output file for each of the players, the source-button is specified with this parameter.
